{"id":1604701629,"question_id":3820,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"7Â months","timestamp":1744471931,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2448 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1604701629/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Number of Unique XOR Triplets II","memory":"100.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    template<int SZ, int MXBIT> struct Trie {\n        int next[SZ][2], sz[SZ], num = 0;\n        int mxV = 1e9+7;\n        Trie() { memset(next, 0, sizeof(next)); memset(sz, 0, sizeof(sz)); }\n        void insert (int x, int a = 1) {\n            int curr = 0; sz[curr] += a;\n            for (int i=MXBIT-1; i>=0; i--) {\n                int t = (x>>i)&1;\n                if (!next[curr][t])\n                    next[curr][t] = ++num;\n                sz[curr = next[curr][t]] += a;\n            }\n        }\n        int test(int x) {\n            if (!sz[0]) return -mxV;\n            int curr = 0;\n            for (int i=MXBIT-1; i>=0; i--) {\n                int t = ((x>>i)&1)^1;\n                if (!next[curr][t] || !sz[next[curr][t]])\n                    t ^= 1;\n                curr = next[curr][t];\n                if (t) x ^= (1LL<<i);\n            }\n            return x;\n        }\n    };\n\n    int uniqueXorTriplets(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();          \n        // Trie<1500, 32> xorOne, xorTwo;\n        unordered_set<int> xorOne, xorTwo;\n\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            for (int j=i; j<N; j++) {\n                xorOne.insert(nums[i] ^ nums[j]);\n            }\n        }\n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            for (int j : xorOne)\n                xorTwo.insert(nums[i] ^ j);\n        }\n        return (int)xorTwo.size();\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"number-of-unique-xor-triplets-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1105}
